summary: Six high school seniors celebrating in the middle of a lake find themselves trapped on a rowboat due to a man-eating fish.
cast: Daniel Zovatto|Bonnie Dennison|Chris Conroy|Jon Orsini|Griffin Newman|Mackenzie Rosman|Mark Margolis|Graham Reznick
keywords: monster|monster fish|creature feature|woman wears a bikini|psychotronic film
title: Beneath
